value.title: Ex-acting ICE director: Root cause of border 'chaos' is reversal of Trump’s immigration policies
value.excerpt: Former Acting Director of U.S. Immigration and Customs Enforcement (ICE) Ron Vitiello argued on “Fox & Friends First” on Monday that the “root cause of the chaos” at the southern border is the reversal of former President Trump’s immigration policies.

value.title: How much money could Biden raise for infrastructure through tougher IRS enforcement? It's not clear
value.excerpt: President Joe Biden wants to raise money for his ambitious economic agenda by ramping up enforcement at the Internal Revenue Service -- a way for the federal government to spend more money without raising taxes or adding to the deficit, making it a win-win in the eyes of lawmakers.

value.title: Trump took a 'sudden interest' in Ghislaine Maxwell when discussing who to pardon, according to a new book
value.excerpt: Donald Trump asked of Ghislaine Maxwell: "Is she going to talk? Will she roll on anybody?" according to journalist Michael Wolff

value.title: Even with our 'darkest days' gone, Biden can't declare full independence from virus
value.excerpt: President Joe Biden conjured a vision of Americans coming back together and reclaiming their freedom from the worst ravages of the pandemic as a nation long silenced by sickness and death exploded back to life on the Fourth of July.

value.title: Trump-Endorsed Greg Abbott Gets GOP Challenger for Texas Governor. Who Is Allen West?
value.excerpt: West said "the sovereignty of Texas" is at risk from illegal immigration, and he's interested in going after banks laundering money for drug cartels.

value.title: Clyburn: Trump could be called to testify before Jan. 6 panel
value.excerpt: House Majority Whip James Clyburn (D-S.C.) said Sunday that former President Trump could be called to testify before the new House select committee investigating the Jan.

value.title: Mike Lindell Promises 'Cyber Symposium' on Election Fraud Will 'Change History,' Reinstate Trump
value.excerpt: "These three days in August are gonna change history…you can't change these packet captures, they're forever captured in time."

value.title: Pro-Trump social media app hacked on launch day as half million sign up
value.excerpt: A social media site launched on Sunday by Jason Miller, a senior adviser to former U.S. President Donald Trump, was briefly hacked, and more than 500,000 people have registered to use the site, Miller said.

value.title: ‘America Together’ but apart: Biden, first lady, VP, go separate ways for July 4 weekend
value.excerpt: President Biden, Vice President Kamala Harris, the first lady and the second gentlemen all go their separate ways as part of the administration's "America's Back Together" tour.

value.title: Bill O'Reilly: Pelosi & Cheney Team Up Against Trump On January 6 Commission
value.excerpt: Pelosi "rammed through" a select committee on January 6... & appointed Liz Cheney to it, reports Bill O'Reilly. "Why? The FBI is already doing it." "What a colossal waste of money," he said.

value.title: Clyburn doesn't want a former president testifying before select committee but says Trump should 'if it comes to that'
value.excerpt: House Majority Whip Jim Clyburn said Sunday he doesn't want to see a former president testify before the House select committee investigating the January 6 insurrection but that Donald Trump should do so "if it comes to that."

value.title: Trump rails against ‘terrible’ NY prosecutors, criminal charges at rally
value.excerpt: Former President Trump came out swinging against the New York prosecutors who brought criminal charges against his organization.

value.title: Walmart, AT&T and Pfizer back lawmakers who supported Trump election fraud lies 6 months after Capitol attack
value.excerpt: Dozens of companies said they'd stop donating to lawmakers who objected to Biden's election victory. Six months later, they are funneling cash to PACs

value.title: Trump makes no mention of DeSantis at Florida rally
value.excerpt: Former President Trump hit plenty of high notes at his rally Saturday night in Sarasota, Florida. But he glaringly didn't mention the name of his strong ally in the Sunshine State - GOP Gov. Ron DeSantis.

value.title: Biden sees virus ‘independence,’ but COVID takes no holiday
value.excerpt: Joe Biden is ready to host the largest event yet of his presidency, an Independence Day barbecue and fireworks-watching celebration on the South Lawn on Sunday night

value.title: Team Trump's conservative GETTR app looks suspiciously like Twitter
value.excerpt: GETTR's home screen, posts, and user profiles look similar to Twitter's, whose exile of Trump fueled the right's belief that tech is targeting them.

value.title: What Joe Biden can learn from Richard Nixon’s playbook
value.excerpt: But a deeper analysis shows that the challenges faced by the Nixon administration — from changing views about America’s place in the world, through the pressures of globalisation, to the difficulties in balancing economic and foreign policy — are exactly those facing President Joe Biden today.

value.title: Donald Trump Blasts Radical Left for Trying to 'Cancel' July 4 Holiday
value.excerpt: At a rally on the eve of the holiday, the former president vowed that the country's founders "will never be purged from history or canceled from our hearts."

value.title: Trump wanted to chop up and sell off Mar-a-Lago's grounds in the '90s. This is how preservationists and officials stopped him.
value.excerpt: Donald Trump attempted to subdivide his Mar-a-Lago property and build mansions, but a group of preservationists had other ideas.

value.title: Joe Manchin still silent on Biden nominee with ties to eco-terrorism
value.excerpt: Manchin has yet to say a word on whether he supports Tracy Stone-Manning, Biden’s nominee to lead BLM that has come under major scrutiny in recent weeks.

value.title: Try and try again: GOP tests out myriad attacks on Biden
value.excerpt: Republicans are testing out a myriad of attacks against President Biden, trying to turn public opinion against a popular president among key sectors of the electorate in hopes of boosting their chances in the 2022 midterm elections and beyond.

value.title: Biden defends Sha'Carri Richardson suspension as progressives, some in GOP balk: ‘Rules are the rules’
value.excerpt: President Biden gave a muted response Saturday to sprinter Sha’Carri Richardson’s suspension due to a positive marijuana test that will cut her from the Tokyo Olympics later this month.

value.title: Trump rails against ‘prosecutorial misconduct’ during Florida rally
value.excerpt: The former president brought a MAGA-style rally to Sarasota, where he derided the indictments as "prosecutorial misconduct."

value.title: Donald Trump Compares New York Tax Fraud Charges to a 'Communist Dictatorship'
value.excerpt: "It's unprecedented, unheard of and totally unacceptable in America for prosecutors to run for office on a promise to get their political enemies," Trump said.

value.title: Harris, in optimistic speech, says America 'getting back to work'
value.excerpt: Vice President Harris said Saturday touted the United States’ progress amid the coronavirus pandemic, proclaiming during an optimistic speech that America is “getting back to work.”
